text: Bishop George (secular name Alexander Ivanovich Griaznov, (January 26, 1934 - April 1, 2011) was the Russian Orthodox archbishop of Chelyabinsk and Zlatoust and later bishop of Lyudinovo, auxiliary bishop of the Kaluga eparchy.Obituary in Russian ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2011 deaths Category:People from Kovrovsky District Category:Bishops of the Russian Orthodox Church
title: George (Gryaznov)
